entry.div:
Repairing
snakes
and
lizards
You could well make some
puncheons
according to the form of their scales, & making some bigger & some smaller, according to the shape of the neck, the body, & the tail. If there is something broken, you can graft it on with
small
pieces
points of
iron or steel wire
, &
glue
with
fish
glue
, & then cover it all with gray or black
wax
. But it is necessary to let the
glue
dry for one
day
without touching it.
